item.description:
The Brazilian Grill offers an authentic Brazilian dining experience serving Churrasco a Rodizio, which means “Rotisserie Barbeque.” They also offer a full buffet of soups, fresh salads, cheese, hot entrees, and side dishes. And the best part? It’s all you can eat! Come hungry! A dining experience not to be missed!

Full Rodízio - Complete selection of beef, lamb, pork and poultry, served with mashed potatoes and fried bananas. Also includes unlimited visits to our extensive buffet of salads and appetizers, including cheeses, cold seafood, pasta and vegetables plus international hot dishes. - $26

Gourmet Delight - Includes unlimited visits to our extensive buffet of salads and appetizers, including cheeses, cold seafood, pasta and vegetables plus international hot dishes. - $18

Soup & Salad - Includes unlimited visits to our extensive cold buffet of salads and appetizers and our variety of soups. - $13

NOTE: Each Woman is responsible for their own bar and food tab! Love ya, but can 't afford ya!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll meet you in the foyer wearing my infamous pink hat!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Last Minute Meetup! Dinner at the Brazilian Grill!
